Reward first ending

  • Mael Fabaill ingen Druiain gives the thegn a Crucible Steel Sword when approached at the market in Perth (29-36 damage, 15 armor piercing, 1.5 critical multiplier). She will also give you 340 valuables if Carrion Eaters is finished.
  • 3000 valuables.
  • Each hirdman gains morale.
